text:
"siapa yang melakukan ini?"
[redacted_name] tidak menjawab ia melirik nyoseol yang berada dibelakang [redacted_name] akhirnya [redacted_name] mengikuti arah pandang taekjoo dan menemukan [redacted_name] dengan pakaian yang berantakan.
"dia?"
[redacted_name] diam sebentar sebelum mengangguk kecil, [redacted_name] kemudian berbalik dan mengambil pisau yang berada ditanah dihadapan [redacted_name], [redacted_name] yang melihat itu seketika panik.
"apa? bukan aku! disini banyak pasang mata yang menyaksikan taekjoo melakukan hal itu sendiri!!"
"[redacted_name] ku tidak mungkin melakukan hal itu."
mata [redacted_name] melebar, ia kemudian melihat kek arah [redacted_name] dan ia dapat melihat taekjoo sedang menyeringai dengan tangan ia lipat di dada, kaki [redacted_name] lemas ia langsung terjatuh dan berlutut di hadapan [redacted_name]
"[redacted_name] bukan aku, aku mohon percaya lah pada ku.."
air mata perlahan turun dari nyoseol ia benar benar takut dibunuh oleh [redacted_name] sedangkan [redacted_name] ia mengabaikan semua perkataan [redacted_name] dan sibuk mengelap darah yang berada dipisau itu, setelah pisau itu bersih barulah [redacted_name] mendekat dan mencengkram kedua pipi [redacted_name] menggunakan satu lengannya, dan lengannya lagi yang memegang pisau mulai menggores pipi [redacted_name] dengan gerakan lambat membuat nyoseol menjerit kesakitan.
[redacted_name] yang menyaksikan adegan itu hanya bisa bergedik, ia sebenarnya tidak tega melihat nya namun biarlah biar wanita jalang itu mendapatkan karma nya.
trans:
"Who did this?"
[redacted_name] didn't answer he glanced at nyoseol who stood behind [redacted_name] Eventually [redacted_name] followed taekjoo's line of sight and discovered [redacted_name] in disheveled clothing.
“Him?”
[redacted_name] paused for a moment before nodding slightly, [redacted_name] then turned and picked up the knife lying on the ground in front of [redacted_name], [redacted_name] who saw that immediately panicked.
"what? it wasn't me! there are many pairs of eyes here witnessing taekjoo do that himself!!"
“my [redacted_name] couldn't have done that.”
[redacted_name]'s eyes widened, he then turned to look at [redacted_name] and he could see taekjoo grinning with his arms crossed over his chest, [redacted_name]'s legs went weak he immediately fell to his knees in front of [redacted_name]
“[redacted_name] is not me, please believe me..”
Tears slowly streamed down nyoseol he was truly terrified of being killed by [redacted_name] meanwhile [redacted_name] he ignored all of [redacted_name]'s words and was busy wiping the blood on the knife, once the knife was clean [redacted_name] approached and grasped both of [redacted_name]'s cheeks with one arm, and the other arm holding the knife began to scratch [redacted_name]'s cheek in slow motion making nyoseol scream in pain.
[redacted_name] who witnessed the scene could only squirm, he truly could not bear to look but let the wretched woman get her karma.
